price: 98. Sungguh, Tuhanmu hanyalah Allah, tidak ada Tuhan (yang berhak disembah) melainkan Dia. Pengetahuan-Nya meliputi segala sesuatu.”
arabic: إِنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innamā ilāhukumu al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa wasiʿa kulla shayin ʿil'man
